Bandar 1,3 Kg Sabu Ditangkap di Makassar
06 Nov 2019, 13:11 by Hermawan Mappiwali
Makassar - Polisi menangkap bandar sabu di Makassar, Sulsel, berinisial AC (20) dan AT (19). Sabu seberat 1,3 kilogram yang dibeli dari Kota Medan disita polisi.
"Kita juga menangkap dua kurir, AL dan AT," ujar Kapolrestabes Makassar, Kombes Wahyu Dwi Ariwibowo di Polrestabes Makassar, Jl Ahmad Yani, Makassar, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Polisi awalnya meringkus kedua kurir AL dan AT saat menunggu pelanggan di Jl Kakatua Raya Sabtu (2/11). Polisi menyita barang bukti 80 gram sabu dan melakukan pengembangan.


Polisi menangkap bandar sabu di Makassar, Sulsel, berinisial AC (20) dan AT (19) dan dua orang kurir Foto: Hermawan M-detikcom

"Hasil pengembangan di salah satu kamar Kost di wilayah Kakatua juga, sekitar situ juga, itu kita mendapatkan 1,2 kilogram sabu dan tersangka bandar juga kita tangkap AC dan AT," kata Kombes Dwi.
Selain mengamankan total 1,3 kilogram sabu, polisi juga mengamankan 1 bungkus besar tembakau sintetis dari tangan bandar.
Kepada polisi, tersangka mengaku memasok barang haram tersebut dari kota Medan dan berencana diedarkan ke bandar yang lebih kecil di Makassar.
"Jadi asal barang dari Medan. Tersangka warga Makassar semua," sebut Dwi.
Polisi meyakini para tersangka sudah beraksi sejak lama. Namun polisi juga memastikan para tersangka yang ditangkap tidak terkait dengan jaringan lain alias jaringan baru.
Para tersangka dijerat Pasal 114 dan Pasal 112 UU Nomor 35 Tahun 2009 tentang Narkotika.

Bandar 1.3 Kg Sabu Arrested in Makassar
Nov 6 2019, 13:11 by Hermawan Mappiwali
Makassar - Police arrested a methamphetamine dealer in Makassar, South Sulawesi, with the initials AC (20) and AT (19). Police weighing 1.3 kilograms which were bought from Medan were confiscated by the police.
"We also arrested two couriers, AL and AT," said the Makassar Police Chief, Senior Commissioner Wahyu Dwi Ariwibowo at Makassar Police Station, Jl Ahmad Yani, Makassar, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Police initially arrested two AL and AT couriers while waiting for customers on Jl Kakatua Raya Saturday (2/11). The police confiscated 80 grams of methamphetamine evidence and carried out the development.


Police arrested a methamphetamine dealer in Makassar, South Sulawesi, with the initials AC (20) and AT (19) and two couriers. Photo: Hermawan M-detikcom

"As a result of the development in one of the boarding rooms in the Kakatua region, around there as well, we get 1.2 kilograms of methamphetamine and we also arrest the city of AC suspects," said Commissioner Dwi.
In addition to securing a total of 1.3 kilograms of methamphetamine, the police also secured a large pack of synthetic tobacco from the city.
To the police, the suspect claimed to have supplied illicit goods from the city of Medan and planned to distribute them to a smaller city in Makassar.
"So the origin of goods from Medan. All Makassar suspects," said Dwi.
The police believe the suspects have been in action for a long time. But the police also ensured the arrested suspects were not connected to other networks, aka new networks.
The suspects were charged under Article 114 and Article 112 of Law Number 35 Year 2009 concerning Narcotics.
